S.FORM: satangahan u zuma a kamu u kamu nu Hulam: u kamu nu Amilika:salty u kamu nu Zipun: tinaku a kamu ahecid ahecid ku nisalami' niza tatayna. . ahcid tinacen ku kabi mitaneng tu ahcid! aheciday aheciday ku heci nu lebus. . aheciden aheciden kaku tu silaw. . saaheciday saaheciday ku silaw ni Sayun. Sayun . siahecid siahecid ku heci nu lebus. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
